job_title: Functional Programming Engineer - Haskell/ Scala / Clojure / Elixir
job_description:
Responsibilities include working on research and development on core
blockchain technologies, algorithms, data structures, NoSQL, cryptography,
network security, and scalable robust architectures.

 **Our criteria:**

1\. Strong engineering background, from a reputed university with
bachelors/masters/doctorate degree in computer science or mathematics

2\. Maverick programmer, with a mindset to embrace open source technology
stacks.

3\. A good team player

4\. Ability to thrive in a fast-changing environment with dynamic objectives

5\. Emotional intelligence and the consideration of your teammates

6\. Reflection and continuous self-improvement

7\. Adaptive, willing to learn, teach, lead, and follow

8\. Not afraid of long hours when necessary

9\. Able to handle stress well and maintain a positive attitude

 **Skills:**

1\. Fluent in functional programming language/s - Hakskell / Scala / Clojure /
Elixir / other..

2\. Adept on Linux and other open-source technologies/platforms

3\. Not the slightest averse to learning & mastering new programming
languages/ concepts

4\. Interest in mathematics, code elegance & cryptographic primitives /
libraries

5\. Experience analyzing data structures and algorithms

6\. Experience with advanced concepts of functional programming

7\. Ability to analyze security on large scale systems, designing, working
with, and scaling distributed systems

8\. Knowledge of troubleshooting, concurrency, synchronization, common IPC/RPC
methods and patterns, messaging systems & patterns, solid OS/networking
fundamentals

Job Type: Full-time

Experience:

  * advanced concepts of functional programming: 1 year (Preferred)
  * analyze security on large scale systems, designing, working: 1 year (Preferred)
  * Linux and other open-source technologies/platforms: 1 year (Preferred)
  * analyzing data structures and algorithms: 1 year (Preferred)
  * Functional programming language/s - Hakskell / Scala / Cloju: 1 year (Preferred)

Education:

  * Bachelor's (Preferred)

job_title: Hard Computer Science Problems – Empathetic Polyglots
job_description:
Over 1000+ business rules and multiple processes spanning multiple
geographies, Ianguages, and product categories. The automation system ,
running on over 20 virtual machines (VMs) increased daily throughput by 8x,
managing $50M USD of EBITDA on daily basis.

Understanding a client’s business and transforming it into an accurate and
reliable automation system takes serious talent. That’s why this team is led
by graduates of Harvard, MIT, Carnegie Mellon, UCSD, Dartmouth, Duke, the
IITs.

# **Experience**

0-5 Yrs of Experience

# **Qualification**

**You will solve problems across a** variety of areas of computer science
**:**

  * Working on Machine Learning and Computer Vision, get automation systems to observe and learn from people in the enterprise, so that they improve with time and practice.
  * Building highly available real time and large-scale event processing pipelines
  * Designing systems which scale seamlessly according to demand
  * Build a proprietary cloud-enabled automation platform to support effortless scaling vertically and horizontally, and architected to work across platform
  * Handling mutable shared state, with low latency update requirements, across a variety of SQL and NoSQL database platforms

# **Responsibilities**

**What We Look For**

  * Passion to Build products, systems and tools to handle business requirements that scale over millions of users, their transactions and secure data.
  * Solid CS fundamentals. Ability to pick up new technologies quickly
  * Experience working on, and deploying, large-scale systems in Python, Go, Elixir/Erlang, or other similar languages.
  * You have experience shipping quality code, releasing early, and iterating rapidly.
  * Experience debugging a live production system.

*** **Very strong technical team with a high bar for entry*** **

Write to deepa.m@careerxperts.com to get connected!

# **Job Location**

Bengaluru

Preferable in travel domain. You will be sitting within the IT team of a
business, will be involved in liaising with the Business Analysts and
Development Managers to ensure software projects meet requirements.

### **Required Experience**

  * 2-3 years of experience in Elixir, specifically Phoenix framework
  * Excellent working knowledge of Web-services and server applications using Elixir/Erlang/OTP
  * Experience with Ubuntu/Linux
  * Experience in Redis would be an added advantage

### **Qualifications**

  * B.Tech / M.Tech in Computer Science, but passion and experience counts for more than the degree

We are looking for people with zeal for Sales and Marketing Industry.

  * Male/Female with strong inter-personal, communication, negotiation skills.
  * Graduate, any stream, preferred.
  * Exposure / _experience_ to Sales is an added advantage.

We provide training for the candidates after clearing all level of Interviews.  
It is a fast track Management Program On-the- _job_ training using our Cycle
of Development (COD). During the training period , you will get the
opportunity to earn as per best Indian standards which is associated with
enormous growth, expansion & financial independence.

  

Please do not hesitate to ask any relevant questions that help you in your
development.

Company Description  
  
FireEye is the leader in intelligence-led security-as-a-service. Working as a
seamless, scalable extension of customer security operations, FireEye offers a
single platform that blends innovative security technologies, nation-state
grade threat intelligence, and world-renowned Mandiant® consulting. With this
approach, FireEye eliminates the complexity and burden of cyber security for
organizations struggling to prepare for, prevent, and respond to cyber
attacks. FireEye has over 7,500 customers across 67 countries, including more
than 50 percent of the Forbes Global 2000.

  

Job Description  

Security orchestration is the process of integrating a disparate ecosystem of
SOC tools and processes to automate tasks for simpler, more effective security
operations. The Fireeye Security orchestration and automation helps security
analysts improve response times, reduce risk exposure and maintain process
consistency in organization wide security program. Being able to simplify your
security operations means being able to prioritize alerts, improve staff
efficiencies and decrease response times.

We are seeking seasoned engineers with the passion and experience necessary to
test FireEye’s Security orchestrator and its plugins. This person will help
build a world class automation testing practices that ensures enterprise
readiness of the core security orchestrator. In addition to this test working
of the large number of plugins with various products (Fireeye and 3rd party).
This will form the foundation of one of the key engineering processes across
the organization.

  * This person will be responsible for the design and implementation of scalable software and solutions required for FireEye Security orchestrator product
  * The candidate will be responsible for all aspects of the software development life cycle for the applicable projects, including gathering requirements, design, implementation, testing and deployment.
  * This position requires development skills focusing on platform services, distributed systems architecture, security, maintainability, scalability and performance.
  * Entails ownership of significant areas of the code for both new feature development and maintenance/redesign of existing areas of the product to accommodate rapidly evolving features
  * Continuous focus and contribution in the areas of manageability, availability, scalability, reliability, and maintainability of the product
  * Active participation in our ongoing process enhancements and software development practices

  

Qualifications  

  * Good engineering background with excellent computer science skills. Hands on coding abilities are fundamental.
  * Strong programming skills in Python, Java and OOP
  * Good knowledge of usage and programming on Linux systems
  * Working knowledge of distributed systems, network and messaging protocols, high availability, scalability and related technologies.
  * Ability to quickly learn new technologies and incorporate them in day to day work

Experience of functional programming language like Erlang/Elixir

  * B.E./B.Tech. in Computer Science or higher degree in CS or equivalent experience

  
Additional Information  

  * Strong problem solving, analytic and debugging skills.
  * Experience of functional programming language
  * Ability to adapt to new technologies and programming languages.
  * Excellent organizational skills including ability to manage own time effectively.
  * Very good verbal and written communication
  * Self organized, Independent individual contributor
  * Must work well in a demanding and fast paced team environment.

Mekari is a technology company with a mission to improve the efficiency and
effectiveness of workplace for both employee and management. Mekari focus is
to improve employees and business owner happiness. As a company that cares
about employee happiness, we provide a very good environment for developers to
work.

  

**So, if you:**

  * are an experienced engineer who is looking for a challenging problem to solve
  * enjoy working in an agile environment
  * value work and life balance
  

We also hate strict bureaucracy. We treat everyone equally.

Everyone can talk directly to the CEO or CTO.

We focus on happiness and creating a kick-ass product.

Then, Mekari is the best place for you to work.

  

Currently, we’re looking for **VP Engineering** to help us:

  * Developing the product
  * Working closely with the product owner to develop a solution for our customers
  * Working closely with DevOps to maintain the application in our infrastructure
  * Mentoring junior developers to develop their skills
  

Skills and Requirements:

  * Passionate as a problem solver & software engineer
  * Love to learn new things
  * Good knowledge of Ruby on Rails

(best practices, how it works internally, patterns, refactoring)

  * Understand to test your code (unit and integration test)
  * Comfortable with JavaScript framework: ReactJS or VueJS
  * Good understanding with database (structure, optimation, tuning)
  * Experience with scaling web application
  * Know the basic of Linux administration
  * Have some experiences in deploying an app to production environment
  * Willing to learn Elixir and Phoenix
  

You will impress us if you:

  * experience with Docker
  * open source contributor
  

Our Perks:

  * Competitive salary
  * Flexible working hours
  * Premium Health Insurance
  * Fun and friendly environment
  * Education allowance
  * Employee development & engagement
  * Strategic office location
  * etc
  

What are you waiting for? Join us now!

Our team will review your application and will be in touch if your application
is shortlisted to the next stage. If you do not hear from us in 30 days, we
will keep your resume on file in case a relevant opportunity opens up.

We wish you the best. Have a great day

  * Build systems capable of handling millions of requests per-day
  * Design, code and maintain standards compliant APIs
  * Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems

##### **DEPARTMENT- Software Development Center (SDC)**

LOCATION- Delhi/NCR

##### **JOB DESCRIPTION**

The Elemental team is a pure Erlang/Elixir stack and is largely composed of
smaller groups working on separate services all interconnected. Some of the
things we are working on include OAuth server, Job workers for handling daemon
jobs like adding newly scraped data to database, search and recommender
services. On the frontend, we use Angular.js and React.js.

  * Understanding of building blocks and basic fundamentals of web and scale (Web Servers, Caching, etc.)

  * Great problem solving and logical skills, adaptable
  * Passion to learn and execute with perfection
  * Should have solid hands-on experience with one or more Ruby, Python or NodeJS web Framework(s)

**Senior Software Engineer – Mobile**

Are you passionate about learning and intellectually curious? Do you thrive in
a fast-paced, innovative work environment where team members hold themselves
and others accountable? Are you energized by trying new things, have an agile
mindset, and enjoy making an impact? Is working for a purpose driven
organization important to you? If the answers to these questions are a
resounding YES, then read on!

Skillsoft is the global leader in helping businesses solve their biggest
challenge – attracting, motivating, and retaining world-class talent. Our team
is recognized for cutting-edge digital learning and human capital management
solutions. Trusted by the world's leading organizations, including 65% of the
Fortune 500, we train more professionals than any other company in the world.
Our 100,000+ courses, videos, and books are accessed over 130 million times
every month, in 160 countries and 29 languages. At Skillsoft, we believe that
knowledge is the fuel for innovation and innovation is the fuel for business
growth.

Skillsoft’s SumTotal Strategic Business Unit has nearly 30 years of learning
and HR software experience. High-performing organizations recognize that
learning and development are core to their business success and overall talent
management and workforce initiatives. That’s why more than 3,500
organizations, including many of Fortune’s “Best Places to Work,” rely on
SumTotal’s solutions to enable their employees.

We are all about "Making Work Matter." With over 2,000 employees around the
world, we are always looking for amazing talent!

  

Overview:

To succeed in this challenging journey, we have setup multiple co-located team
across the globe (Hyderabad, US, Europe), embracing the SAFe agile framework,
a Micro Services approach combined with the DevOps model. We have dozens of
engineers working full time on this new platform and are setting up a new
office in Boston downtown to open a new development squad where you will be
located – and it’s only the beginning. You will have the chance to work with
brilliant people and some of the best development and design firms in the US
in addition of working with cutting edge technology as React Native, React JS,
Ruby, Elixir, Docker, Kubernetes.

We’re looking for people who love to stay on top of the latest and greatest
technologies and patterns. We need our engineers to be versatile, display
leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to tackle new problems as we continue
to push our technology forward."  

Opportunity Highlights:

  * Deliver across the entire app life cycle –concept, design, build, deploy, test using leading-edge hybrid technologies such as React Native. 
  * Build reusable prototypes with out-of-the-box thinking 
  * Working along with different squads to create and maintain a robust framework to support the app
  * Working with the front end developers to build the interface with a strong eye on user experience.
  * Optimizing performance for the app. 
  * Keep up to date on the latest industry trends in mobile. 
  * Gathering requirements, application design, technical leadership, support API design capabilities, designing Unit testing frameworks for mobile, and implementation. 
  * Engagements will include building responsive UI on Native mobile platforms and cross platform offerings for both tablet and handheld form factors. 

Skills & Qualifications:

  * Strong in OOPs, Data Structures and Algorithms 
  * 6 years of overall software development experience. 
  * 2 years of development experience on Mobile using Microservices Architecture 
  * 2 years of hybrid mobile development experience using Javascript Technologies (React Native or Angular) 
  * Experience in Test frameworks is a must (CasperJS/PhantomJS/Mocha/Jasmine.) 
  * Experience with code versioning tools, preferably Git (Github, Gitlab etc.) and the feature branch workflow 
  * Knowledge of CI/CD process 
  * Experience with automation tools like Npm/Webpack/Grunt/Bower etc is a must. 
  * Experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment  

Success Qualities:

**Adaptable and Agile.** Responds quickly to the changing needs of the
business and is resilient in the face of setbacks or adversity.

**Confident & Audacious Achiever. **Champions breakthrough initiatives and
holds him/herself and others accountable for delivering. Enjoys working hard;
is action-oriented and full of energy for the things he/she sees as
challenging; not fearful of acting without over-analysis.

**Entrepreneurial Spirit with Learner’s Mindset.** Is uncomfortable with
simply maintaining "status quo" and is intellectually curious and demanding of
excellence and continuous improvement.

**Committed to our Collective Purpose.** Leverages cross functional
collaboration to solve complex business issues and drive greater results.

**Authentic & Customer Centric.** Never compromises integrity to achieve
results while constantly being mindful of creating a positive customer
experience both internally and externally. Adheres to an uncompromising set of
core values and beliefs during both good and bad times; practices what he/she
preaches. Acts with the highest standards of conduct and is seen as a direct,
truthful individual.

**Thank you for taking the time to learn more about us.**  
**If this opportunity intrigues you, we'd love for you to apply!**

NOTE TO EMPLOYMENT AGENCIES: We value the partnerships we have built with our
preferred vendors. Skillsoft does not accept unsolicited resumes from
employment agencies. All resumes submitted by employment agencies directly to
any Skillsoft employee or hiring manager in any form without a signed
Skillsoft Employment Agency Agreement on file and search engagement for that
position will be deemed unsolicited in nature. No fee will be paid in the
event the candidate is subsequently hired as a result of the referral or
through other means.

You will be responsible for designing and building web pages that draw high

You will be working with a team of highly qualified and motivated engineers,

B.Tech. (or equivalent) with 4 yrs relevant experience, or M.Tech. with 3 yrs
relevant experience in web production and development.  
  
Must have experience in HTML, DHTML, XML, ASP.NET or ASP, PHP.  
  
Must have experience in client side scripting such as Javascript.  
  
Experience in Macromedia Flash and Action Script is a plus.  
  
Understanding of cross-browser and cross-platform compatibility issues is
integral.  
  
A solid design and implementation background either in e-commerce or client /
server or distributed object oriented paradigms.  
  
Must have strong Technical Skills / Depth, Inter-personal skills, Project
Management Skills, Communication Skills and an ability to think out-of-the-
box.

job_title: Personal Assistant part time job/internship at Chennai
job_description:
**About the company:**

Avaesa is a one-stop center in Chennai for all your metaphysical needs. We
offer merchandise that includes raw crystals, sacred geometry goods and
jewelry, crystal jewelry and gem elixirs to name a few. We value quality and
handpick our crystals from various trusted vendors across the globe. Apart
from our merchandise, Avaesa is a community-in-making, which would be
conducting workshops on meditation, healing modalities, tarot, self-
empowerment among others. For us, Avaesa it isn't just a business because we
operate from a deeper place in our hearts to connect with amazing souls like
you. We wish to bring to everyone various experts, teachers and other guiding
influences to nourish your minds, bodies and most importantly our souls.

 **About the internship/job:**

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 1. Scan pictures,
sheets, and books 2. Upload photos, sort, organize files and folders 3. Manage
data entry and others This position has a lot of miscellaneous
responsibilities. This is ideally suited for someone who is looking to make
money during the vacation. Only female candidates can apply.

 **Who can apply:**

Only those students or freshers can apply who:

  * are available for the part time job/internship (it may be part time in-office or part time at home/work from home online)
  * have relevant skills and interests
  * can start the part time job/internship between 8th Apr'20 and 13th May'20
  * are available for duration of 1 month
  * have already graduated or are currently in any year of study
  * are from Chennai and neighboring cities
  * Females willing to start/restart their career may also apply

 **Number of internships/jobs available:** 1

 **Categories:** Operations,MBA

Send us your resume at hr@iqinfotech.co.in with details of your academic
qualifications and skilled expertise.

  

Key Skills

Developing, configuring and troubleshooting FreeSWITCH or Asterisk Experience
with message and job queuing services (RabbitMQ) Should be able to customize
or develop from scratch modules in asterisk, kamalio, Freeswitch

### **Responsibilities**

  * Design, develop and implement telephony networks with various components like SIP proxies, registrar, media-servers, etc in a cloud environment. 
  * Ensure that the voice architecture is highly available, fault-tolerant, and highly scalable. 
  * Troubleshoot and resolve voice and network protocol communications/routing issues. 
  * Write Custom Codes for Development 
  * Create tools to automate critical aspects of production systems 

### **Key Skills**

  * 5+ years of industry experience in developing, configuring and troubleshooting FreeSWITCH or Asterisk 
  * Experience with message and job queuing services (RabbitMQ) 
  * Should be able to customize or develop from scratch modules in asterisk, kamalio, Freeswitch 
  * Should have experience of working with proxy such as kamalio, opensip, RTPProxy 
  * Should have experience of working with load balancers with sip signals and media 
  * Should have experience in transcoding audio/video codecs 
  * Should have experience in redis database, mysql 
  * Should have thorough knowledge of SIP stacks and media servers 
  * Should possess good programming knowledge in C/C++, perl 
  * Should be good understanding of database and integrating db with VoIP switch 
  * Good in development of AGI,FastAGI, Dialplan, FS Scripts 
  * WebRTC knowledge would be edge 

### **Requirements**

Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Telecommunications, and/or
equivalent work experience Some software development experience with an
object-oriented or functional programming language (Python, Elixir or Go are a
plus)

### **Nice to have**

  * Experience with Open Source VoIP applications such as Kamailio, OpenSIPS, FreeSWITCH, RTPEngine, Asterisk and open source tools such as Wireshark, sngrep and Homer 
  * Experience with containers and automation tools such as Docker, Ansible, Jenkins and Kubernetes 
  * Understanding of IP telephony (VoIP), TCP/IP Networks and related protocols (SIP, RTP, RTCP, ISUP, TLS, STUN, TURN, WebRTC) 
  * Experience with Linux, open source tools and shell scripting 
  * An appreciation of functional programming and a strong desire to become an expert Python, Elixir or Go programmer. 
  * Experience working with relational databases at scale

**Responsibilities**

  * Good experience on Linux Commands, Linux Administration, PHP, MySQL, JavaScript and web maintenance
  * Experience in managing, maintaining, installing and configuring Asterisk/ VICIdial/ VICIbox/ GoAutoDial/ IP PBX systems
  * Should have Hands on experience on Dialplan writing for Complex IVR Systems
  * Creating, Managing and Integrating service provider SIP/VoIP Accounts with asterisk
  * Ability to Configuring Analogue / PRI Lines
  * Knowledge in ZAPTEL, DAHDI, Asterisk Implementation and Integration To any call center or contact center environment.
  * Able to troubleshoot Dialer/Asterisk related issues and following up with service providers on open issues
  * PHP programming experience for customizing VICIdial/GoAutoDIal
  * Good knowledge of MySQL database with database backup and restore
  * In time delivery of tasks assigned. Documentation & Quality check of delivering task
  * Provide standby technical support outside office hours to handle unexpected network issues, asterisk related issues, including weekends

**Knowledge and Skills**

  * Should be able to customize or develop from scratch modules in asterisk, kamalio, Freeswitch
  * Should have knowledge of working with load balancers with sip signals and media
  * Should have knowledgein transcoding audio/video codecs
  * Should have knowledgein redis database, mysql
  * Should possess good programming knowledge in C/C++, Perl.
  * Should be a good understanding of database and integrating db with VoIP switch
  * Good in development of AGI,FastAGI, Dialplan, FS Scripts
  * WebRTC knowledge would be edge

**Education And Experience**

  * Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Telecommunications, and/or equivalent work experience Some software development.
  * 2+ years of industry experience in developing, configuring and troubleshooting FreeSWITCH or Asterisk.
  * Experience with Open Source VoIP applications such as Kamailio, OpenSIPS, FreeSWITCH, RTPEngine, Asterisk and open source tools such as Wireshark, sngrep and Homer.
  * Experience with containers and automation tools such as Docker, Ansible, Jenkins and Kubernetes.
  * Experience with Linux, open source tools and shell scripting.
  * An appreciation of functional programming and a strong desire to become an expert Python, Elixir or Go programmer.
  * Experience working with relational databases at scale

Founded over the fall of 2016 by Tech entrepreneur Amir Mansour, BlackSwan is
a fantastically fast-growing startup at the cutting edge of e-commerce and Ad
Tech. BlackSwan is now exiting stealth mode and further consolidating its
leadership position on the market.

This is where you come in…

What are we looking for?

  * You’re ambitious and pride yourself on your ferocious attention to details.
  * You take pride in knowing your software can take tens of millions of hit an hour.
  * You desire to be part of an elite, all-star, all-sharing, all-learning team.
  * You take pride in the quality of your code and your devoted work ethic.
  * You love numbers and use them extensively in ETA, metrics, KPIs,

## **Technical Requirements**

  * Demonstrable **Ruby experience** with strong **Elixir** inclination or grasp
  * Strong analytical and problem solving skills
  * Experience with functional programming
  * Experience with SQL-based databases such as **MySQL** or **Postgres**

## **Preferences will be given to candidates who have**

  * Experience in the Ad Tech space
  * Proven ability to implement high scale web services
  * Experience with AWS, C.I pipeline and Dev Ops
  * Experience with NOSQL databases such as **Elasticsearch**

## **Perks**

  * Extremely Competitive package with profit sharing / bonus plan.
  * Stock Options eligibility for star performer.
  * Flexible work schedules
  * Endless opportunity for personal / professional growth
  * Work on cutting edge technologies

### **Job Features**

Job Category

Expert

Coordinate & manage all project lead activities of the company, participate in
the development of strategic direction, work in close co-ordination with
development team leaders, should be ready to travel. Excellent communication
and presentation skills.

You will be working with a team of highly qualified and motivated engineers,
building the next generation of our client's web services.

Solid exp. in Project Leadership with specific examples of projects from start
to finish with teams of at least 10 people, working knowledge of tools - ROSE
/ MS Project / Visio and Rational, proficient in .Net techs. (Frame work,
ASP.Net, C#) Leadership quality.

Greetings from Elixir

  
  

We have openings with one of our investment banking client in Mumbai (Goregaon
East) forAsst Manger/Manager[-Financial Planning and Analys. Kindly go through
he job description and the interested candidates can send their cv to

rashmi.m@elixir-consulting.com  

  

Job Description:

**Key Responsibilities (covering a multitude of roles):**

**Performance Measurement and Related Analytics:** ****

  * Analyzing, investigating and explaining key movements and trends in P&L lines 
  * Preparation of monthly financial metrics and key business drivers specific to different products
  * Reviewing processes and suggesting/ implementing improvements & changes to current procedures
  

  

**P &L & Headcount Reporting / Analytics:** ****

  * Preparation of various P&L & Headcount reports and ensuring timely adherence to deadlines
  * Monthly variance reporting and reporting of any issues, risks & opportunities, Flash reporting (pre- month end estimates of expenses) 
  * Monthly management reporting, updating reporting decks & management reviews with Finance Management as required

**Weekly Estimate Process:** ****

  * Assist in preparing weekly financial estimates for various products together with a geographic view
  * Assist region products in preparing estimates
  * Consolidation of regional company 's results
  

  

**Budgeting and Forecast Process:** ****

  * Working with Country & Regional Managers to create and review quarterly forecasts and annual financial plans, including reporting & analysis to explain changes against given baselines

**Month End Reporting activities:** ****

  * Assist in key month end activities which provides oversight of completeness and accuracy of underlying management information
  * Support various teams with key Management reporting as appropriate
  * Reviewing financials on a daily basis during the month-end period and reporting issues to finance management, comparing Actual to plan/ forecast/ prior period to ensure correct month-end close & investigating unusual postings and/ or escalating with Countries
  * Working as part of a diverse team spread across the region, Interaction with a wide range of people and exposure to Regional /Global Finance Owners

**Shift timings :1.30pm - 10.30pm (Must be flexible)**  

  

**Required Candidate profile**

 **Knowledge/Experience:**

  * Good financial analysis and management reporting background having 1-6 years prior work experience 
  * Experienced in Microsoft Office (including PowerPoint & Excel)
  * Experience of working with financial data and knowledge of financial reporting tools. Essbase, Business Objects would be a plus.
  * Interest in business and economic environment

**Skills:**

  * Effective communication skills 
  * Strong analytical and problem solving skills
  * Attention to detail is an essential part of the job
  * Adaptability, multitasking and project management skills
  * Demonstrate an ability to learn and desire to develop and improve by challenging status quo
  * Interpersonal skills (ability to work with colleagues at all levels across multiple locations) 

_Salary:_ INR 5,00,000 - 15,00,000 PA.

_Industry:_ Banking / Financial Services / Broking

 _Functional Area:_ ITES, BPO, KPO, LPO, Customer Service, Operations

 _Role Category:_ Voice

 _Role:_ Associate/Senior Associate -(NonTechnical)

###  **Keyskills**

Management ReportingFinancial AnalysisHyperion Essbasevariance
analysisBusiness ObjectscognosForecastingMIS ReportingBusiness
Planningfp&aMonth End Reportingfinancial planningBudgetingTrend Analysis

  

Education-

 _UG:_ B.Com - Commerce

 _PG:_ MBA/PGDM - Finance, CA

 _Doctorate:_ Doctorate Not Required

job_title: Application Architect | EdTech Prod Org | Pune/Mohali
job_description:
* Senior role reporting directly into VP Engineering

  * Opportunity to be associated with the booming EdTech industry

## **About Our Client**

Our client is a US headquartered product organization in the EdTech space.

## **Job Description**

  * Design, develop and execute software solutions to address business issues by applying your experience and critical thinking.

  * Collaborate with senior developers across locations and contribute in architectural discussions and solutioning process.

  * Provide architectural blueprints and technical leadership to the software development team.

  * Closely work with developers, QA Lead and other technology staff as needed to aid in problem solving.

  * Assist the VP Engineering, Engineering Managers and Lead Devs to continuously improve overall development operations on the floor.

## **The Successful Applicant**

**Must Haves** :

  * 15+ years of experience

  * Sound knowledge of best engineering practices

  * Hands on experience with application architecture; ability to understand end to end system design

  * Fundamentally strong understanding of **microservices architecture** and **modern software architectures, Single page apps, Modern web stack, SSO and other system integrations**

  * Core tech stack: java/.net/RoR

  * **Hands on experience with at least one functional programming languages like Erlang, Elixir**
  * Knowledge of **front end technologies** like **Angular, React, Vue** etc 

  * Great communication skills

**Good to Haves** :

  * Prior experience with transitions of teams

  * Track record of collaboration with multiple stakeholders and global counterparts- particularly US & European team members

**The Ideal Candidate** :

  * Experience from product based organizations

  * Exposure to functional programming languages like Erlang, Elixir

## **What's on Offer**

  * Opportunity to design scalable products from scratch
  * Association with EdTech

**Senior Software Engineer (Fullstack)**

Are you passionate about learning and intellectually curious? Do you thrive in
a fast paced, innovative work environment where team members hold themselves
and others accountable? Are you energized by trying new things, have an agile
mindset and enjoy making an impact? Is working for a purpose driven
organization important to you? If the answers to these questions are a
resounding **YES** , then read on!

Skillsoft is the global leader in corporate learning. We help businesses solve
their biggest challenge – attracting, motivating and retaining world class
talent. Our team is recognized for cutting edge digital learning and human
capital management solutions. Trusted by the world's leading organizations,
including 65% of the Fortune 500, we train more professionals than any other
company in the world. Our 100,000+ courses, videos and books are accessed over
130 million times every month, in 160 countries and 29 languages. At
Skillsoft, we believe that knowledge is the fuel for innovation and innovation
is the fuel for business growth.

Skillsoft’s SumTotal Strategic Business Unit has nearly 30 years of learning
and HR software experience. High-performing organizations recognize that
learning and development are core to their business success and overall talent
management and workforce initiatives. That’s why more than 3,500
organizations, including many of Fortune’s “Best Places to Work,” rely on
SumTotal’s solutions to enable their employees.

We are all about “ _Making Work Matter_.” With over 2000 employees around the
world, we are always looking for amazing talent!

Overview:

To succeed in this challenging journey we have setup multiple co-located team
across the globe (Hyderabad, US, Europe), embracing the scaled agile
framework, a Micro Services approach combined with the DevOps model. We have
passionate engineers working full time on this new platform in Hyderabad and
it’s only the beginning. You will have the chance to work with brilliant
people and some of the best development and design firms in addition of
working with cutting edge technologies as React, Elixir, Node.js, Ruby,
Docker, Kubernetes.

This position is responsible for architecting, designing, creating, testing,
and ensuring the quality of moderately complex software for a major product or
product line. Principal Software Engineer will perform complex code
modification, testing, and debugging tasks as well as provide high level
research and analysis related to software design and development

We are looking for exceptional Java based full stack developers to join our
team and also learn new technology as Node.js which some of our teams already
use. You will work jointly with Architect and DevOps to form a fully
autonomous development squad and be in charge of one part of the product.

Skills & Qualifications:

  * Minimum 7+ years of software engineering development experience background working with developing cloud based enterprise solutions. 
  * Strong knowledge in working with REST API*, Web services and SAML* integrations
  * Experience working with databases preferably Postgres.
  * Experience in programming languages (Java*, Ruby, Elixir, JavaScript*, HTML5*, CSS*)
  * Experience with frameworks (Spring Boot, Ruby on Rails) 
  * Experience in Javascript frameworks (Node.js*, React*, Redux, Angular, Express.js)
  * Experience with DevOps (Docker, Kubernetes, Ansible, AWS)
  * Experience in UI Test frameworks (CasperJS, PhantomJS, Mocha, Jasmine, JEST, Selenium, etc.)
  * Experience with code versioning tools, preferably Git (Github, Gitlab, etc) and the feature branch workflow
  * Good in multi threading, algorithms and complex problem solving skills
  * Advanced design, debugging and coding skills
  * Experience with automation tools like Maven, Gradle, NPM, WebPack, Grunt
  * Must know how to code applications on Unix/Linux based systems*.
  * Experience in working with Agile/Scrum environment*.
  * Challenge the status quo.
  * Encourage and use experimentation as a tool to achieve continuous improvement of team performance.
  * Support design and refactoring through rapid prototyping and experimentation during research and refactor spikes.
  * Write and maintain documentation to describe program development, logic, coding, testing, changes, and corrections.
  * Participate in self-directed learning activities aimed at developing deep expertise within technical domain, including reading relevant publications, participating in domain forums or groups etc.
  * Have a deep understanding of context within which our products are being developed, deployed and used.
  * Have a solid understanding of the user personas for the product within the technical domain and deep empathy for the needs of those users.
  * Strong analytical skills and the ability to understand complexities and how components connect and relate to each other
  * Coaching and mentoring skills.
  * Technical expert with in-depth programming and product knowledge and strong technical skills combined with project management and leadership ability.

Release/PI Planning

  * Prepare for Release Planning, including:
  * Support Product Management in program backlog refinement, and estimating features and epics.
  * Collaborate with the System Architects to:
  * Understand and communicate non-functional requirements relevant to the team/feature.
  * Identify and define Architectural epics and features in the Program Backlog, including refactors.
  * Capture and communicate how the system does what it does using whatever form of documentation is appropriate to serve the Release Planning process.
  * Actively participate in Release Planning:
  * Establish own capacity/velocity for each increment.
  * Support story refinement, help identify risks and dependencies.
  * Support the Agile Team in establishing achievable PI objectives.
  * Help to identify dependencies and foster cross team co-ordination.
  * Commit to the mutually agreed plan.

Iteration Planning

  * Prepare for Iteration Planning, including:
  * Actively participate in backlog refinement sessions in collaboration with other Agile team members.
  * Identify and capture backlog items local to the team, such as defects and refactors.
  * Participate in Iteration Planning, including:
  * Actively participate in team planning and contributing to team goals.
  * Work with the Product Owner to establish the acceptance criteria for a story.
  * Volunteer for and commit to delivering stories and tasks within the iteration.
  * Contribute to a statement of the iteration goals, working in partnership with the Product Owner to define the business objectives for the iteration.

Education and Certifications:

  * BE or MCA or equivalent preferred
  

Success Qualities:

**Adaptable and Agile.** Responds quickly to the changing needs of the
business and is resilient in the face of setbacks or adversity.

**Confident & Audacious Achiever. **Champions breakthrough initiatives and
holds him/herself and others accountable for delivering. Enjoys working hard;
is action-oriented and full of energy for the things he/she sees as
challenging; not fearful of acting without over-analysis.

**Entrepreneurial Spirit with Learner’s Mindset.** Is uncomfortable with
simply maintaining "status quo" and is intellectually curious and demanding of
excellence and continuous improvement.

**Committed to our Collective Purpose.** Leverages cross functional
collaboration to solve complex business issues and drive greater results.

**Authentic & Customer Centric.** Never compromises integrity to achieve
results while constantly being mindful of creating a positive customer
experience both internally and externally. Adheres to an uncompromising set of
core values and beliefs during both good and bad times; practices what he/she
preaches. Acts with the highest standards of conduct and is seen as a direct,
truthful individual.

**Thank you for taking the time to learn more about us.**  
**If this opportunity intrigues you, we'd love for you to apply!**

NOTE TO EMPLOYMENT AGENCIES: We value the partnerships we have built with our
preferred vendors. Skillsoft does not accept unsolicited resumes from
employment agencies. All resumes submitted by employment agencies directly to
any Skillsoft employee or hiring manager in any form without a signed
Skillsoft Employment Agency Agreement on file and search engagement for that
position will be deemed unsolicited in nature. No fee will be paid in the
event the candidate is subsequently hired as a result of the referral or
through other means.

We are looking for experienced Web Developers for designing and developing
client web offices. You will work closely with the development team.

You will be responsible for designing and building web pages that draw high
traffic to client's sites.

You will be working with a team of highly qualified and motivated engineers,
building the next generation of our client's web services.

### **Qualifications:**

B.Tech. (or equivalent) with 4 Yrs relevant experience, or M.Tech. with 3 Yrs
relevant experience in web production and development.

Must have experience in HTML, DHTML, XML, ASP.NET or ASP, PHP.

Must have experience in client side scripting such as Javascript.

Experience in Macromedia Flash and Action Script is a plus.

Understanding of cross-browser and cross-platform compatibility issues is
integral.

A solid design and implementation background either in e-commerce or client /
server or distributed object oriented paradigms.

Must have strong Technical Skills / Depth, Inter-personal skills, Project
Management Skills, Communication Skills and an ability to think out-of-the-
box.

Job location: Mumbai

Experience: 2 to 4 Yrs

If you are interested in the above mentioned profile, please send your updated
word format CV along with the following details to jobs@elixir.in  
Current CTC:  
Expected CTC:  
Notice Period:

job_title: Software Engineer, Insider Live : Back End
job_description:
**Job Description:**

Play it Live on Insider.in is an interactive content platform where organisers
can create video formats that can combine real-time audience reactions,
adaptive content, sponsor messaging, commerce and rewards. Over the last
couple of months, we have launched a variety of innovative shows on the
platform including live open mic events, themed quizzes, talk shows,
predictive polling events and so on.

We are building this cool product using leading technology like Elixir/Erlang,
MQTT, Javascript, etc that helps us achieve scale and very low latency. The
battle-tested Erlang VM enables us to build high performant, fault-tolerant,
distributed and auto-healing systems inherently. If you have built distributed
systems at scale or excited to work on one. Here is an opportunity, We are
hiring!

**Opportunity :**

You would be part of every decision taken in building the product. You will be
working on functional programming languages (if you haven't worked on any ,
but you are willing to work on one, we got you covered) and dealing with
distributed systems problems on a regular basis. This would make you think
about writing code differently. The learnings and challenges are limitless.

**Skills Required :**

  * Should have at least 2 years of solid design and implementation experience of writing backend web services at scale. 

  * Experience with modern tech stack like Elixir, Go, Ruby, Javascript (Node/React), etc.

  * Experience debugging and deploying live production systems.

  * Self-motivation and the ability to take a high-level goal and deliver shippable code.

**Bonus Points:**

Experience with functional programming languages.

Experience working with Erlang VM (BEAM).

Experience writing and designing programs that handles concurrency or
parallelism elegantly.

If you are a proactive , self-driven developer and love building systems for
scale, come join like-minded folks in building the next-gen interactive
customer centric **OTT product built on OTP.**

**Senior Software Engineer - Fullstack**

a fast paced, innovative work environment where team members hold themselves

NOTE TO EMPLOYMENT AGENCIES: We value the partnerships we have built with our
preferred vendors. Skillsoft does not accept unsolicited resumes from
employment agencies. All resumes submitted by employment agencies directly to
any Skillsoft employee or hiring manager in any form without a signed
Skillsoft Employment Agency Agreement on file and search engagement for that
position will be deemed unsolicited in nature. No fee will be paid in the
event the candidate is subsequently hired as a result of the referral or
through other means.

**What does this role hold for you…??**  
  
**Coding**

  * Writing efficient and scalable solution for all product problems
  * Building abstractions and contracts with separation of concerns for a larger scope
  * Developing robust and scalable web-based applications

**Technical Design**

  * Doing high-level design with guidance, Functional modeling, break-down of a module
  * Thinking platforms & reuse

**Architecture**

  * Doing incremental changes to architecture if required and impact analysis of the same
  * Doing performance improvements in large scale service-oriented architecture company Development
  * Inspiring other minds in team and fostering team spirit

**Apply if you have…**

  * A minimum of 3 to 6 years of experience with a graduation/post-graduation degree in Computer Science/ Mathematics (IITs, IIITs, and NITs preferred)
  * Expert programming experience in any one general programming language- Ruby/ Elixir/ JAVA/ Node.js (strong OO skills preferred)
  * Hands-on experience in writing APIs using frameworks like Rails with a good understanding of MVC architecture
  * Solid experience with REST and API design
  * Sound knowledge of one RDBMS system. Understanding of transactions, query optimization techniques, indexes, etc. are required
  * A solid foundation in computer science, with sound knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and software design
  * Enthusiasm for solving complex and interesting problem statements
  * An experience with search techniques and solid foundation in search engines- Solr, Elastic search or others (desirable)
  * An experience in NoSQL datastores like Redis, MongoDB, Couchdb, etc. with an understanding of underlying sharing and scaling techniques (desirable)
  * An experience in building highly scalable business applications, which involve implementing large complex business flows and dealing with a huge amount of data
  * An experience with Cloud-based development (AWS), microservices architecture, Dockers, etc. (desirable)

**Know more about us…**  
  
Know more about us and our team, visit www.housing.com, www.proptiger.com &
www.makaan.com

* **_Minimum Qualifications_**
    * E/B.Tech in Computer Science or Electrical Engineering
    * 10+ years of solid software development experience
    * Preferably a polyglot programmer who can code in at least 2 high-level languages (Java / Ruby / Python / JS / Go / Elixir)
    * Expert level development skills in at least one language.
    * Extensive knowledge of at least 1 cloud platform (AWS, Microsoft Azure, GCP) preferably AWS.
    * Good knowledge and experience with Agile, TDD or BDD methodologies

  

  * **_Preferred Qualifications_**
    *  ** _Exposure or knowledge in Renewable Tech companies_**
    * Familiar with working with any embedded or telecom or hardware product is desirable
    * Ability to work on a fast-paced environment
    * Experience with IoT based systems preferred

Are you a DevOps engineer who loves alternative culture and comedy? Then
consider joining Insider.in’s rapidly growing engineering team.

At Insider.in, we’re a lean team running a fast stack on a host of
microservices on AWS. Largely running on Node.js, with a lot of Elixir, PHP,
Python, and R sprinkled in, we’re looking for a DevOps engineer to lead the
team in best practices in our path to becoming one of the most popular
destinations online to find something new in your city.

You should ideally have a strong Amazon Web Services experience. You will work
with the existing teams very closely and build on top of tools like
Kubernetes, Docker and Terraform and support our numerous polyglot services.

Introducing a strong DevOps ethic into the rest of the team is crucial, and we
expect you to lead the team on best practices in deployment, monitoring, and
tooling. You’ll work collaboratively with software engineering to deploy and
operate our systems, help automate and streamline our operations and
processes, build and maintain tools for deployment, monitoring, and operations
and troubleshoot and resolve issues in our dev, test and production
environments.

**Key Requirements**

  * Strong background in Linux/Unix System Administration.
  * Experience with automation/configuration management like Ansible.
  * Experience with Terraform/CloudFormation or equivalent.
  * Ability to use a wide variety of open source technologies and cloud services (experience with AWS is required).
  * Strong experience with Redis and MongoDB.
  * A working understanding of Node.js.
  * Knowledge of best practices and IT operations to maintain highly available cloud-native services.
  * Strong experience with ECS/Kubernetes/Docker Swarm.
  * Strong experience working in a production environment of significant scale for at least 2 years.
  * Experience with cloud-native monitoring tools like Prometheus/Nagios preferred.
  * Experience with running Logging Infrastructure stacks like EFK at scale.
  * Experience with distributed tracing and APM tools a plus.

**Skills**

MongoDB, Node.js, Linux System Administration, Amazon Web Services, Docker,
Kubernetes, ELK Stack, Prometheus/Nagios Experience

### **Job ID: FSD01**

The lead microservices engineer will have a range of responsibilities from
shaping and implementing digital products to ensuring that we stay on the
leading edge of technology. They will be expected to contribute across the
full technology stack, from database and DevOps infrastructure that
supportscontinuous deployment, over native apps, to front end development. As
a Lead Engineer they will work in a cross-functional team with the Product
Owner, Designers and engineers to co-develop the digital products.

##### **ROLE RESPONSIBILITIES**

  * Lead the engineering team within a cross-functional, Agile squad to deliver digital journeys and products together with product and design.
  * Define the framework and push for the best choice when it comes to technology selection and implementation.
  * Use Agile engineering practices and various software and web development technologies to rapidly develop creative and efficient solutions that enhance the client customer and employee experience.
  * Lead team members to craft clear user stories, design tests for prototypes and products, and continuously deliver product enhancements.
  * Liaise with other teams within and outside the Digital unit to negotiate timelines, deliverables and dependencies.
  * Collaborate closely with Product Owners and teams’ members to identify and socialize product and delivery risks.
  * Drive forward and role-model best practice engineering processes and Agile behavior and ensuring teams members follow suit.
  * Communicate with business stakeholders about Agile processes to set and manage expectations about delivery methods and timelines.

##### **MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS**

  * Excellent programming skills in at least 2 modern programming languages/frameworks, such as Node.JS, Go Lang, Elixir, Ruby on Rails, C, C++, Python, or others.
  * Excellent working knowledge of HTML/ CSS, and a modern frontend Javascriptframework, such as ReactJS, AngularJS, EmberJS, Vue.js
  * Excellent knowledge of SQL and one common database technology, such as Postgres, MySQL, MongoDB, Cassandra, CouchDB, HBase, Neo4J
  * Infrastructure knowledge including RESTful APIs, Single Sign On, LDAP, Search Technologies (Apigee, GraphQL, Swagger, Elasticsearch, Kibana, auth0)
  * Full stack engineer with a passion for mentoring other colleagues in the team
  * Should be a change agent that always challenges status quo
  * Real passion for development and a demonstrated appetite for continual learning
  * Knowledge of pair programming, continuous integration and test-driven development
  * Familiarity with the concepts and pattern choices for Microservices is a must
  * At least 8 years of software development experience with experience working in Agile teams
  * Experiences with code refactoring, design patterns, design-driven development, continuous deployment, highly scalable applications, application security
  * Working knowledge and experience in designing distributed applications
  * Working knowledge of DevOps, Docker and infrastructure as code
  * Experience with at least one unit testing framework, such as MochaJS, RSpec
  * Community contributions (e.g., open source work, publishing / speaking on technical ideas)is a plus

##### **OTHER INFORMATION**

Join a fun and lively young Startup based in Dubai Silicon Oasis (while
operating from Noida, India). Boost your experience and learn about the
different types on Online AdTech environments and models. Show your skills and
potentially become a pillar of our fast-growing team.Jubna offers an
Attractive compensation, Health Insurance, Travel Allowance.  
Some travel to Dubai, UAE is required (10%)

job_title: Shuttl | SE | SSE | TL | Python Backend Development | Bangalore
job_description:
* Work with the next big unicorn in travel tech space

  * Industry leading remuneration with a top-notch team

## **About Our Client**

Founded in April 2015, Shuttl (www.shuttl.com) is India's largest bus-
aggregating platform. Shuttl aims to make daily commute more convenient for
urban intra-city travellers and currently caters to the needs of commuters in
the Delhi-NCR & 9 other cities. Well-funded by Amazon US, Dentsu, Sequoia
Capital, Times Internet and Lightspeed Ventures with a total cumulative
funding of $50mn till date, the young and dynamic organization is already
disrupting the transport industry by leaps and bounds. Shuttl, through its
tech-enabled platform currently operates on 150+ long routes with more than
1000+ buses on the platform and 100K daily ridership. The entire team
passionately works towards one common goal- solving the problem of Indians
looking for a smarter mode of commuting and offer affordable public transport,
powered by cutting-edge technology leading to lesser traffic and better, de-
congested cities.

## **Job Description**

You will be responsible for the following:

  * Hands-on backend engineering on various products in Consumer, Enterprise, Inter City & International business lines

  * Development of new features and maintaining existing ones

  * Extensive contribution towards architecture and code design

  * Building quality software in a timely fashion using prescribed engineering processes

## **The Successful Applicant**

  * BE/ B.Tech/ MCA from a premier engineering institute

  * 3+ years of experience in high scale backend engineering

  * Excellent hands-on knowledge of Python/ Functional programming languages (like Scala, Haskell, F#, Elixir, Erlang, etc.) along with some experience in GIT

  * Exposure to client side languages like JavaScript, ReactJS and experience in API design and development is a huge plus.

  * You should be knowledgeable about programming languages, operating systems, networks, databases and SQL, algorithms, architecture, code design and design patterns

  * Quick learning ability and willingness to adapt to latest programming paradigms

## **What's on Offer**

  * Competitive salary package with lucrative stock options

  * Opportunity to work with a well funded, high growth start-up

**Senior Developer (Backend / Full Stack)**

 **Requirements:**

  * 6-12 years of experience building good quality production software
  * Excellent knowledge of at least one ecosystem based on Elixir/Phoenix, Ruby/Rails, Python/Django, Java/Scala/Clojure
  * Good OO skills, including strong design patterns knowledge
  * Familiar with datastores like MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, Redshift, HBase etc.
  * Familiarity with react.js/react-native, vue.js, bootstrap etc.
  * Experience of a big data solution using Kafka / Spark / Hadoop
  * Knowledge of deploying software to AWS, Heroku
  * Knowledge of software best practices, like Test-Driven Development (TDD) and Continuous Integration (CI)

  

#### **What You Need for this Position**

You should have knowledge of:

  * Elixir/Phoenix
  * Ruby/Rails
  * Python/Django
  * Java/Scala/Clojure

job_title: Java Backend Developer with Big data experience @ Bangalore
job_description:
We have a opening for Java Backend developer with Big data for one of our
prestigious client @ Bangalore location.  

  * Big data
  * Strong Java Programming
  * API / Web Services
  * Should have Hands on Experience with Spring boot/Spring ,Kafka,Kubernetes, Micro services.
  * Experience loading data using Java backend skills
  * Have done heavy data processing work using Java backend and microservices.
  * Good experience in Cloud and related Technologies.
  * Any Cloud experience but GCP is strongly preferred
  * Managing onshore and offshore candidates for delivery and deployment of very large scale Data Platform.

  
4.00-12.00 Years  
Bachelor Of Technology (B.Tech/B.E)

Overview:

  

As a Software Engineer on the Data Products team, you will help build and
maintain the backend of ISS DataDesk, an advanced screening and analytics
platform for environmental, social, and governance data. You will work closely
with other development teams, product management, application management, and
QA to build and ship software using the newest technologies and tools.

  
Responsibilities:

  * Design, develop, test, deploy, and maintain high quality software for client facing products as well as internal tools to load/manage data and improve our processes
  * Collaborate with cross-functional engineering peers and product management to implement end-to-end solutions

Qualifications:

  * BE/B-Tech degree in Computer Science or other engineering field
  * 2-5 years of experience implementing complex systems using Java or Ruby
  * Strong OO skills with knowledge of design patterns
  * Proficient with Git
  * Thorough understanding of data structures and algorithms
  * Database experience, ideally SQL Server or Postgres
  * Experience delivering RESTful web services
  * Excellent verbal and written communication skills
  * Experience with functional programming a plus (e.g. Elixir, Clojure)

  

**What we look for**

  * You thrive in a culture of learning and are passionate about challenging yourself and sharing your knowledge with others.
  * You want to be part of a fast-paced organization with an agile environment and open communication channels.
  * You are not afraid to take risks and look for novel and creative solutions.
  * You are highly motivated and able to work both independently and collaboratively within a team.
  * You are able to craft simple and elegant solutions to complex problems.
